_comment: MA3 Analysis Tab Feedback Messages - Instructors can edit these
NAME_MISSING: [X] Name is missing from cell B10.
NAME_TOO_SHORT: [!] Name in B10 appears too short: '{name}'. Expected full name.
DIFF_NONE_CORRECT: [X] No correct difference formulas found in D14:D63.
DIFF_NOT_FORMULA: [x] {cell}: Contains a value, not a formula.
STAT_MEAN_WRONG: [x] {cell}: Mean formula incorrect. Expected AVERAGE function.
STAT_MEDIAN_WRONG: [x] {cell}: Median formula incorrect. Expected MEDIAN function.
STAT_STDEV_WRONG: [x] {cell}: Standard deviation formula incorrect. Expected STDEV, STDEV.P, or STDEV.S function.
STAT_RANGE_WRONG: [x] {cell}: Range formula incorrect. Expected MAX-MIN calculation.
PERCENTILE_WRONG: [x] {cell}: Percentile formula incorrect. Expected PERCENTILE, PERCENTILE.INC, or PERCENTILE.EXC function.
EMPIRICAL_ALL_CORRECT: [OK] Both empirical rule formulas are correct (lower and upper bounds).
EMPIRICAL_NONE_CORRECT: [X] No correct empirical rule formulas found.
EMPIRICAL_LOWER_WRONG: [x] {cell}: Lower bound formula incorrect. Expected =I18-I20 or equivalent.
EMPIRICAL_UPPER_WRONG: [x] {cell}: Upper bound formula incorrect. Expected =I18+I20 or equivalent.
WRITTEN_MISSING: [X] Written analysis is missing from section 5b.
WRITTEN_TOO_SHORT: [!] Written analysis appears too short ({length} characters). May need review.
FORMAT_CELL_WRONG: [x] {cell}: Should be formatted as Number with 2 decimal places.
